thread.section_title: Dharma Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfectly located boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Perfectly located boutique hotel - Review of Dharma Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: mtnspirits
title: Perfectly located boutique hotel
text:
The Dharma is a sanctuary in Rome! It is located a short walk from the train station and near many of the famous attractions of Rome. The area feels safe at night and is also near some good shopping and restaurants. The less expensive rooms are small but very well appointed. The more you spend, the more luxurious the rooms get (do it!) The staff was very friendly and helpful with directions. I will definitely stay here again.
Room Tip: The higher you stay in the hotel, the further you get from the city street noise See more room tips
